p.span: Sets the value(s) the specified field(s) of a Context. The fields that may be set are: avg, count, domainMax, domainMin, notes, read, sdev, search, uom, write. This command is a "generating" command, which means it must be run as the first command.
xsSetContextFields context [IN container] [BY class] [SCOPED scope] (FIELD field VALUE value)+
| xsSetContextFields AirTime IN MyAirTime BY Tuesday SCOPED global FIELD read VALUE * FIELD write VALUE *
Sets the values of the read and write fields to '*' (all) of a Context called 'AirTime' in the container 'MyAirTime' by class 'Tuesday' with scope 'global'.
The container the context is stored.
The fields of the context to display.
The scope (private, app, global) where the container is stored.
The context is displayed in table format. See xsCreateDDContext or xsCreateDDContext for details about creating a Context.
